title: br: The ResizableRuntime make some unit test taking too long to finish
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->

master

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->

Run unit test `test_txn_api_version::test_raftstore_v2_must_new_and_configure_cluster`.
It should finish in 20s, but it actually takes more than 120s.

### What did you expect?

The unit tests could finish faster.

### What did happened?

It takes too long time to finish.
